price: 50 revêtus de goudron, les visages recouverts du feu de l’Enfer.
arabic: سَرَابِيلُهُم مِّن قَطِرَانٖ وَتَغۡشَىٰ وُجُوهَهُمُ ٱلنَّارُ

version.title: French Translation - Rashid Maash
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French by Rashid Maash

meta.transliteration: sarābīluhum min qaṭirānin wataghshā wujūhahumu al-nāru
